mapper.select: SELECT S.SURVEY_NO AS surveyNo, S.SURVEY_TITLE AS surveyTitle, S.SURVEY_REGISTER AS surveyRegister, S.REGNO AS regNo, S.REGDATE AS regDate, S.MANAGE_CODE AS manageCode, SVT.SV_T_NO AS surveyTitleNo, SVT.SV_T_QTITLE AS surveyTitleQ, MP.MANAGE_TITLE AS manageTitle FROM SURVEY S INNER JOIN MANAGE_PRESENTATION MP ON S.MANAGE_CODE=MP.MANAGE_CODE AND S.MANAGE_CODE=#{manageCode} INNER JOIN SV_TITLE SVT ON S.SURVEY_NO=SVT.SURVEY_NO AND SVT.SV_ANS_OPT_TYPE=#{surveyAnsOptType}
